Presenting the Clubs

  • Mechanical Club


    We present you the AutoCad competition and the RoboWar.

  • Civil Club


    We present you the Tower Making competition and Dream Planner (3D).

  • Robotics Club


    We present you the Line Following and OffRoad Challenges.

  • Circuitronics Club


    We present you Circuit Debugging and Labyrinth.

  • Basic Sciences Club


    We present you the Powerpoint Presentation competition and Extempore Speech.

  • Debating and Quiz Club


    We present you the Inter College Debate Competition.

  • Coding Club


    We present you Capture the Flag and the Game of Codes.

  • Web Designing Club


    We present you the Pro Design Creator and Be a Replicator.

All the registrations can be done on the spot.

A few workshops might need online registration. Please check accordingly and contact us if you've any questions.
